name: DownFall (itch) (Vergon Forge)
description:
Arcade game from a 48 hour game jam solo developed by Cronecs.

Are you for a challenge of trying to dodge ballons armed with deadly spikes?

CONTROLS

A - D --> movement (left & right)

SPACE --> Unique ability dodge ( Makes you invulnerable, beware, it has a CD)

You spawn in a "box" to get out use the Dodge ability!

Good luck, its not that easy!
